this is my first tutotial
git updates were rejected
1 2  git push -f origin main   git delete branch
1 2 3 4 5 6  // delete branch locally git branch -d localBranchName // delete branch remotely git push origin --delete remoteBranchName git push -d origin BranchName   clean Directory and files
1  git clean -fd   Reset all changes done after a commit
1 2 3 4  to discard all changes git reset --hard // to delte last commit git reset --hard HEAD^   Rename a branch
1  git branch -M main   Push Commands
1 2  // to push all branches git push --all origin   git commits
1 2 3  // amend without editing last commit message git commit --amend --no-edit

title: How to run a flutter app offline
